import React from "react"; import "./ControlPins.css"; import photo from "./stm8blue-pinout.png"; import WriteValue from "./WriteValue"; class Config extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { inoutValuePD3: "", inoutValuePD2: "", inoutValuePD1: "", inoutValuePC7: "", inoutValuePC6: "", inoutValuePC5: "", inoutValuePC4: "", inoutValuePC3: "", inoutValuePB4: "", inoutValuePB5: "", inoutValuePD4: "", inoutValuePD5: "", inoutValuePD6: "", inoutValuePA1: "", inoutValuePA2: "", inoutValuePA3: "" }; this.handleInOutChange = this.handleInOutChange.bind(this); this.sendInOutChanges = this.sendInOutChanges.bind(this); } handleInOutChange(event) { var pinName = event.target.value; switch (pinName) { case "oPD3": case "iPD3": this.setState({ inoutValuePD3: event.target.value }); break; case "iPD2": case "oPD2": this.setState({ inoutValuePD2: event.target.value }); break; case "iPD1": case "oPD1": this.setState({ inoutValuePD1: event.target.value }); break; case "iPD6": case "oPD6": this.setState({ inoutValuePD6: event.target.value }); break; case "iD5": case "oPD5": this.setState({ inoutValuePD5: event.target.value }); break; case "iPD4": case "oPD4": this.setState({ inoutValuePD4: event.target.value }); break; case "iPC7": case "oPC7": this.setState({ inoutValuePC7: event.target.value }); break; case "iPC6": case "oPC6": this.setState({ inoutValuePC6: event.target.value }); break; case "iPC5": case "oPC5": this.setState({ inoutValuePC5: event.target.value }); break; case "iPC4": case "oPC4": this.setState({ inoutValuePC4: event.target.value }); break; case "iPC3": case "oPC3": this.setState({ inoutValuePC3: event.target.value }); break; case "iPB4": case "oPB4": this.setState({ inoutValuePB4: event.target.value }); break; case "iPB5": case "oPB5": this.setState({ inoutValuePB5: event.target.value }); break; case "iPA1": case "oPA1": this.setState({ inoutValuePA1: event.target.value }); break; case "iPA2": case "oPA2": this.setState({ inoutValuePA2: event.target.value }); break; case "iPA3": case "oPA3": this.setState({ inoutValuePA3: event.target.value }, () => {}); break; default: } } sendInOutChanges() { var config = [] config.push(this.state.inoutValuePD3); console.log(config); } render() { return (


{/* set input/output list for right side pins */}
{/* set 0/1 value list for all pins */} {/* set input/output list for left side pins */}
); } } export default Config;
